Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: ate usa di kauma de saradaram ne jinham ne inakara kita ate praloka di mulakata nu buthala'i'a asim unham nu sasarika jivana vica khusahali bakhasisa kiti si. Unham ne kiha ki iha tam sade varaga hi ika bada hai uhi khanda hai jihara tusim khande ho ate uha hi pinda hai jihara tusim pinde ho
Ate jekara tusim apane varage hi ika bade di gala mani tam tusim vade ghate vica rahaunge
Ki iha bada tuhanu kahida hai ki jadom' tusi mara ja'uge ate miti ate hadi'am ho javoge tam phira tusi' kabaram vicom kadhe ja'unge
Iha phazula galam hana jihari'am tuhanu dasi'am ja rahi'am hana
Jivana tam iho hi hai sasarika jivana. Ithe asim marade ham ate ji'unde ham ate asim phira utha'e jana vale nahim
Iha tam basa ika ajiha bada hai jisa ne alaha upara jhutha marhi'a hai. Ate asim isa nu manana vale nahim
Rasula ne kiha he mere palanahara! Meri madada kara (ki'unki) inham ne mainu jhuthala dita hai
Farama'i'a ki iha loka jaladi hi pachata'unage
Ate unham nu site vajom ika bhi'anaka avaza ne phara li'a. Phira asim unham nu kura kacara bana ke rakha dita. Tam dafa ho'i zalima kaumma
Phira asim unham tom magarom anekam kaumam paida kiti'a
Ko'i kauma na apane va'ade tom age jandi ate na usa tom piche rahidi

Phira asim lagatara apane rasula bheje jadom vi kise kaumma de kola usa da rasula a'i'a tam unham ne usa tom inakara kita. Tam asim ika tom ba'ada ika sari'am da mali'a meta kara dita. Ate asim' unham nu kise kahani'am bana chadi'a. Tam dura hona uha loka jihare imana nahim li'a'unde
Phira asim musa ate usa de bhara haruna nu apani'am nisani'am ate pratakha dalilam de nala bheji'a
Phira'auna ate usa de darabari'am de kola, tam uha hakari loka sana, unham ne hakara kita
Tam unham ne kiha ki ki asim apane varage do adami'am di gala mana la'i'e. Jadom' ki inham di kauma de loka sade gulama hana
Phira unham ne unham nu jhuthala dita. Phira uha nasata kara dite ga'e
Ate asim musa nu kitaba diti tam ki uha raha pa'una
Phira asim mari'ama de bete ate usa di mam nu ika nisani bana'i'a ate asim unham nu ika uci dharati ute ika tikana dita, jihari santi di jag'ha si ate uthe pani da casama vaga riha si
